channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Arctic Air Could Bring Dangerous Temperatures to Parts of the U.S.
item.description: And a winter storm could dump up to a foot of snow from the Central Plains to the East Coast.

item.title: 6 Living Hostages Will Be Released to Israel This Weekend, Hamas Says
item.description: The militant group’s chief negotiator also said Hamas would increase the number of living hostages it would release on Saturday to six from three.

item.title: As a G.O.P. Congressman Takes Aim at Hochul, a Democrat Eyes His Seat
item.description: Representative Mike Lawler, Republican of New York, is contemplating running for governor next year. Beth Davidson, a Democrat, hopes to win his swing...

item.title: What We Know About the Delta Plane Crash in Toronto
item.description: All 80 people aboard the Delta flight from Minneapolis clambered out of the plane, with 18 suffering injuries.

item.title: TikTok is back in the Apple and Google app stores in the U.S.
item.description: TikTok was removed from Apple and Google’s app stores on Jan. 18 to comply with a law that requires Chinese parent company ByteDance to divest the app...

item.title: Uber’s CEO says no one wants to compete with Tesla—or Elon Musk
item.description: Tesla's Cybercab, or robo-taxi, was announced last October and is due to hit the roads in Texas this June as part of a trial roll-out.

item.title: 6 Living Hostages Will Be Released to Israel This Weekend, Hamas Says
item.description: The militant group’s chief negotiator also said Hamas would increase the number of living hostages it would release on Saturday to six from three.

item.title: A Delta Plane Crashes in Toronto, but Tragedy Is Averted
item.description: All 80 people aboard Delta Flight 4819 survived a crash landing at a windy and snowy Toronto airport.

item.title: Hochul to Weigh Removing Mayor Eric Adams in Meeting With City Leaders
item.description: After four top aides to Mayor Eric Adams resigned, calls for him to step down are growing.

item.title: Judge in Eric Adams Case to Consider Bid to Dismiss Corruption Charges on Wednesday
item.description: Judge Dale E. Ho will hear the government’s rationale for its request to stop the corruption case against New York’s mayor. Former U.S. attorneys are ...

item.title: Buffett sold more BofA stock while keeping Apple stake intact
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in the bank to 8.9% in the fourth quarter after selling 117.5 million shares.

item.title: U.S. and Russian Officials Agree to Work on Ukraine War Settlement
item.description: After more than four hours of discussions in Saudi Arabia, both sides also agreed to work on normalizing bilateral relations and investments.

item.title: Your reusable water bottle may be a breeding ground for strep and fecal bacteria. Here’s how to keep it clean
item.description: You’d be surprised at what might be growing inside your water bottle.

item.title: Mexico’s President Sheinbaum said her government would ask Google to make ‘Mexican America’ pop up on maps of the U.S.
item.description: Sheinbaum has repeatedly defended the name Gulf of Mexico, saying its use dates to 1607 and is recognized by the United Nations.

item.title: U.S.-Russia Talks in Saudi Arabia Set to Go Beyond Ukraine
item.description: The two sides met in Saudi Arabia for their most extensive discussions in years. In addition to Ukraine, business ties are on the table.
